scripts.prepare: poetry install && poetry run pre-commit install --install-hooks
scripts.start: BUILD_PATH='./nms_blueprint_calculator/react_assets' react-scripts build && poetry run python -m nms_blueprint_calculator start
scripts.commit: node -e "const mssg = process.argv[1]; require('child_process').execSync('yarn build && git add . && git commit -m \"' + mssg + '\"', { stdio:[0, 1, 2] })"
